content.html: Huh! When did that happen? Today I learned that GitHub supports light/dark mode images with within markdown. ``` ![Logo](./dark.png#gh-dark-mode-only) ![Logo](./light.png#gh-light-mode-only) ``` Video alt: Example showing a markdown image adapting to user preferences.
content.value:
Huh! When did that happen? Today I learned that GitHub supports light/dark mode images with within markdown.

```
![Logo](./dark.png#gh-dark-mode-only)
![Logo](./light.png#gh-light-mode-only)
```

Video alt: Example showing a markdown image adapting to user preferences.
